name: HexCars
description:
OBJECTIVE

  • Paint the most number of hexagons posible.
  • Remember to refill your paint tank periodically.
  • Pick up powerups that will help you win the game.

INTRUCTIONS

  • WASD - Movement Player 1 + Menu navigation
  • Spacebar - Use powerup Player 1
  • Arrow keys - Movement Player 2 + Menu navigation
  • Shift Key - Use powerup Player 2

Note:  Also compatible with Xbox controllers

GAME INSTALLATION

  1. Download and uncompress zip + execute Hexcars Online.exe 
  2. Set the resolution settings for your screen.
  3. Enjoy!
